page.title: 14RELIGION IN L. STAUGHTON
page.content: In Little Staughton there are the {Parish Church (Church of England)}and the{Baptist Chapel.}At the parish church on a normal Sunday there is a congregation of about 15-20 people. At Christmas and Easter the cogregations are larger,about 70 at Christmas and 35 at Easter.The Rev. John Laird is the vicar of Little Staughton and Keysoe and holds a service in each church every Sunday. There is a weekly Sunday service in the Baptist Chapel attended by about 12 people. There is also a Sunday School. Members of other churches e.g.Roman Catholic,Methodists,Salvation Army, attend services in Bedford, St. Neots, or Kimbolton.
